siteMetadata.subtitle: Computer Programmer living in Omaha, NE
siteMetadata.title: Blog by Matt Payne

markdownRemark.html:
[TermUX.com] is an android application containing a Linux distro (no X-Windows). I’ve installed it on my ChromeBook via the Play Store.

It’s a bit of a pain to get things from termux into the rest of the chromebook. I like:

  1. python -m http.server
  2. http://100.115.92.2:8000/ # Note I get the IP # for TermUX using ifconfig and looking at the IP for the arc0 interface.
